#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char str[4][4];
    int i,j,c1=0,c2=0,f=0;
    for(i=0;i<4;i++)
    {
        gets(str[i]);
    }
    for(i=0;i<3;i++)
    {
        if(f==1)
            break;
        for(j=0;j<3;j++)
        {
             f=0;
            c1=0;c2=0;
            if(str[i][j]=='a')
                c1++;
            else
                c2++;
            if(str[i][j+1]=='a')
                c1++;
            else
                c2++;
            if(str[i+1][j+1]=='a')
                c1++;
            else
                c2++;
            if(str[i+1][j]=='a')
                c1++;
            else
                c2++;
          //  cout<<c1<<" "<<c2<<endl;
                if(c1>=3 || c2>=3)
                {
                    f=1;
                    break;
                }
        }
    }
    if(f==1)
        printf("POSSIBLE\n");
    else
        printf("NOT POSSIBLE\n");
 
}
